name: ruff-lsp
description: Language Server Protocol implementation for Ruff

repo.name: ruff-lsp
repo.description: A Language Server Protocol implementation for Ruff.

readme.summary: Excellent clarity and examples with comprehensive editor-specific setup guides, but lacks troubleshooting section and is deprecated software.
readme.top_issue: No troubleshooting section for common problems, and the package is deprecated which severely impacts its utility despite good documentation

injection_risks.description: The subprocess.check_output function is used with a list of arguments that includes user-controlled input (interpreter). This could potentially lead to command injection if the interpreter path is not properly sanitized.

The subprocess.check_output function is used with a list of arguments that includes user-controlled input (executable). This could potentially lead to command injection if the executable path is not properly sanitized.

critical_findings: Potential command injection vulnerability in subprocess calls
Lack of input validation and sanitization
security.summary: The code has some security concerns related to potential command injection vulnerabilities and lack of input validation, but overall it appears to be well-structured and follows best practices.

common_complaints: Documentation gaps around integration with other LSPs (pyright)
Unclear configuration for enabling fixAll behavior in editors
praise_themes: Speed and capabilities of ruff appreciated
sentiment.summary: Healthy community with engaged users asking thoughtful integration questions and maintainers responding; issues reflect documentation gaps rather than product dissatisfaction.

communication.summary: The responses are generally clear and patient, but could benefit from more technical depth in explaining decisions.

concerns: No commits in the past 6 months despite last commit being in December 2024
28 open issues with no recent activity to address them
Zero closed issues in the past 6 months indicates no maintenance effort
No merged PRs in the past 6 months shows no active development
No active contributors in the past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release cycle has stalled
maintenance.summary: ruff-lsp appears to be abandoned with no maintenance activity in at least 6 months despite having unresolved issues.

project_metrics.description: A Language Server Protocol implementation for Ruff.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides clear and detailed information on the package, its features, and installation instructions, but lacks troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: Few commits in the past six months (3)
More open issues than closed ones (23 open, 5 closed)
